LEI.description: The LEI ID of the organisation

TrademarkIPOCode.description: The Intellectual Property Office (IPO) is the official body responsible for intellectual property (IP) rights including patents, designs, trademarks and copyright. (Code: UK or EU only)

TrademarkID.description: The trademark number that has been registered with the Intellectual Property Office. Note: The 2 letter IPO prefix should be omitted

ProductType.description: Descriptive code for the product category

ProductName.description: The name of the product used for marketing purposes from a customer perspective. i.e. what the customer would recognise

items.description: Marketing or industry segment that the product is designed for

InternationalPaymentsSupported.description: Indicates that the account supports international payments

ProductIdentifier.description: Identifier within the parent organisation for the product. Must be unique in the organisation

CardWithdrawalLimit.description: The daily Limit that a customer can get via the ATM. This describes the default limit rather than the maximum

ProductDescription.description: Description of the product provided by the parent organisation

TsandCs.description: URL provided by the parent organisation which redirects to the current T&Cs

AccessChannels.description: Ways to interact with the bank when managing account

Contactless.description: Does the card issued have contactless facility

MobileWallet.description: Mobile wallet supported by this product. A mobile wallet being any electronic device that allows an individual to make electronic commerce transactions

items.description: Mobile wallet supported by this product. A mobile wallet being any electronic device that allows an individual to make electronic commerce transactions

CardNotes.description: Optional additional notes to supplement the card details

CreditScoringPartOfAccountOpeningForGett.description: Indicates whether a credit check performed on an inquiry to open an account is submitted

CreditScoringPartOfAccountOpeningIsAHard.description: Describes the type of credit scoring

CreditScoringPartOfAccountOpeningText.description: Details on the specific credit scoring

CreditScoringPartOfAccountOpeningForIDVe.description: Indicates whether a credit check is used to check the address of a potential new account holder

CreditScoringPartOfAccountOpeningIDVerif.description: Details on the specific credit scoring

MaximumMonthlyCharge.description: The maximum Relevant Charges that could accrue

ProductURL.description: URL provided by the organisation which redirects to the product (on live products only). There might be more than one product at a given URL

Currency.description: Currency of the Account. Default to GBP at present

OverdraftOffered.description: Indicates whether an overdraft offered for this account

ExistingFeature.description: Indicates whether the account has any feature

ProductState.description: Describes if the offering is promotional or a description of a future state.

LengthPromotionalInDays.description: Describes the length if only a duration is given instead of a date

DateOfChange.description: Date of the change if it refers to future terms

LengthPromotionalInDays.description: Describes the length if only a duration is given instead of a date

DateOfChange.description: Date of the change if it refers to future terms

FeatureType.description: Type that represents the nature of the feature

FeatureDescription.description: A textual explanation of what the feature

FeatureValue.description: The value or values permissible for a specific feature for an individual product representing a product characteristic

CriteriaType.description: Criteria that is required in order to be eligible for the feature

ProductState.description: Describes if the offering is promotional or a description of a future state.

LengthPromotionalInDays.description: Describes the length if only a duration is given instead of a date

DateOfChange.description: Date of the change if it refers to future terms

ExchangeRateAdjustment.description: The margin added, by certain card issuers, to the scheme rate in order to arrive at the exchange rate qouted as the reference exchange rate to the cardholder

AgeRestricted.description: Indicates a customer's age is part of eligibility criteria

MinimumAge.description: Minimum age, in years, required to hold an account

MaximumAge.description: Maximum age, in years, allowed to hold the account

MaximumAgeToOpen.description: Maximum age, in years, to open an account

OtherFinancialHoldingRequired.description: Indicates that it is necessary to hold another product with the bank in order to be eligible for this product or feature

IncomeTurnoverRelated.description: Indicates if eligibility linked to income

SingleJointIncome.description: Minimum Income Source. For certain products a minimum income is required. This can be mandated as to the single income or to a joint income. This field describes this

MinimumIncomeTurnoverAmount.description: Minimum income / Turnover required to hold the product

IncomeCondition.description: Stipulates any particular definition of income that applies to the income eligibility and/or method by which income must paid into the account (eg Salary DD)

MinIncomeTurnoverPaidIntoAccount.description: Minimum Income Amount required to paid into the account

MinimumIncomeFrequency.description: The frequency that the minimum mentioned before is deposited in the account. Yearly is very important for premium accounts

ResidencyRestricted.description: Indicates a customer's residency forms part of the eligibility criteria

ResidencyRestrictedRegion.description: Indicates a customer must be current resident of a geographic area/country

MaxNumberOfAccounts.description: Maximum number of the same prodcut the customer may hold

ThirdSectorOrganisations.description: Is the product available to operate as a Clubs or Societies account?

MinimumDeposit.description: A minimum deposit required to hold this account

OpeningDepositMinimum.description: Minimum Amount to be held on account

OpeningDepositMinimumCurrency.description: The currency of the Minimum Amount to be depositing at opening

MinimumOperatingBalanceExists.description: Is there a Minimum Operating Balance?

MaximumOpeningAmount.description: A maximum amount to be deposited at opening

OpeningDepositMaximumAmount.description: Maximum Amount to be depositing at opening

OpeningDepositMaximumCurrency.description: The currency of the Minimum Amount to be depositing at opening

EligibilityName.description: Free text description, denotes non standard eligibilities not included in the code list

EligibilityNotes.description: Optional additional notes to supplement the eligibility conditions. Only used for very specific conditions

PreviousBankruptcy.description: Describes if a previous bankruptcy / insolvency disqualfies for this account Details in ELI-280

CreditCharged.description: Is credit paid to the account. The answer will be the condition of all other fields to be filled

InterestTierSubType.description: Describes if the offering is promotional, regular or a description of a future state

LengthPromotionalInDays.description: Describes the length if only a duration is given instead of a date

DateOfChange.description: Date of the change if it refers to future terms

StartDate.description: If interest is charged on a specific date range as start date (often used for promotion)

EndDate.description: If interest is charged on a specific date range as end date (often used for promotion)

CalculationFrequency.description: How often is interest applied to account

Rate.description: Rate being paid by the bank (gross)

APRAERRate.description: AER or APR Rate for comparison

InterestNotes.description: Additional notes to supplement the interest details

OverdraftProductState.description: Describes if the offering is promotional or a description of a future state.

LengthPromotionalInDays.description: Describes the length if only a duration is given instead of a date

DateOfChange.description: Date of the change if it refers to future terms

CMADefinedIndicator.description: describes that the tiers and bands are set by the CMA order, as opposed to be set by the banks

ArrangementType.description: Defines the arrangement of the overdraft

Description.description: Description for 'Other' code set value applicable to specified attribute

MaximumMonthlyOverdraftCharge.description: Maximum Monthly Charge (MMC) for Overdraft fee and charges.

OverdraftType.description: Defines if the overdraft facility is committed

Term.description: The duration of the overdraft, if it is non permanent

ProductState.description: Describes if the offering is promotional or a description of a future state.

LengthPromotionalInDays.description: Describes the length if only a duration is given instead of a date

DateOfChange.description: Date of the change if it refers to future terms

FeeLowerTier.description: Lower occurrence / range boundary e.g.. For returned cheques this could be 0, which means the first returned cheque fits into this range

FeeHigherTier.description: Higher occurrence / range boundary e.g. For returned cheques this could be 10, which means the first 10 returned cheque fits into this range

FeeType.description: A description of the Fee type

LengthPromotionalInDays.description: Describes the length if only a duration is given instead of a date

DateOfChange.description: Date of the change if it refers to future terms

Negotiable.description: Indicates that this Fee Rate or Fee Amount is negotiable based on risk or other factor

FeeLowerTier.description: Lower occurrence / range boundary e.g. For returned cheques this could be 0, which means the first returned cheque fits into this range

FeeHigherTier.description: Higher occurrence / range boundary e.g. For returned cheques this could be 10, which means the first 10 returned cheque fits into this range

FeesAndChargesNotes.description: Supplementary information for fees and charges

Benefit.description: Describe  one or more benefits if they exist

LengthPromotionalInDays.description: Describes the length if only a duration is given instead of a date in days

DateOfChange.description: Date of the change if it refers to future terms

BenefitType.description: Type that represents the nature of the benefit

BenefitValue.description: The value or values permissible for a specific benefit for an individual product representing a product characteristic

DefaultToAccounts.description: Is the benefit part of the default account

items.description: Criteria that is required in order to be eligible for the Benefit

Counter.description: Counter for the criteria (e.g. number of DD)

BenefitDescription.description: A textual explanation of what the benefit is

PromotionStartDate.description: If the benefit is temporal the start date is when the benefit comes into effect

PromotionEndDate.description: If the benefit is temporal the end date is when the benefit is no longer applicable
